msContents.summary: Record of many different financial accounts associated with St. Paul's from 1806 to 1852, such as: bank stocks; bonds and mortgages; various legacies and loans; funds for the charity school, widow's house, and repairs/additions to the buildings and grounds; and accounts for individual members of the church. There is an alphabetical index at the front of the book. Entries are listed by account and then chronologically, and include the date, amount, and brief explanation of money spent or received.
